content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> "The last dandelion" what do you think about that caption?

Using a storytelling approach can enhance the creative exploration of "The last dandelion," as it encourages you to imagine the circumstances surrounding the dandelion's existence, sparking a narrative that could lead to a more vivid and unexpected caption. By forming a story around the title, you might uncover deeper meanings or connections to other ideas you've discussed that could make the caption even more impactful.
